item.title: Cashcow: flexible financial simulations
item.description: Cashcow is a tool for simulating longer-term financial projections with a focus on answering questions that start with “what if.” I'm currently using this for my own personal finances, but there are some other use cases I'm interested to explore documented below. Example questions I want to be able to answer: What if I start investing $250 / month into my mutual fund after my next raise instead of $100?
